description: [``botocore``] The codestar client has been removed following the deprecation of the service on July 31, 2024.
[``botocore``] DescribeInstanceStatus now returns health information on EBS volumes attached to Nitro instances
[``botocore``] Increase the mapping attributes in Schema to 35.
[``botocore``] Add optional field JobRunQueuingEnabled to CreateJob and UpdateJob APIs.
[``botocore``] Release FilterCriteria encryption for Lambda EventSourceMapping,  enabling customers to encrypt their filter criteria using a customer-owned KMS key.
[``botocore``] Security Hub documentation and definition updates
[``botocore``] Enable email receiving customers to provide SES with access to their S3 buckets via an IAM role for "Deliver to S3 Action"
